metadata.name: Enjoy the Journey
metadata.description:
"What a Wonderful World" - Fundamental and largest KireevArt mixed genre 1/1 art collection of exclusive author’s photographs, that exist on the Ethereum Blockchain. Variety of landscapes and rare stories photographed on my way in the good old days (2009-2019).

Сollection is dedicated to beauty of majestic world and life around us.  
Sends viewer back to that kinder world that I managed to capture in these works in my many years journey. This special collection is sentimental & kind, it is about the bright sides of a life that has become different so quickly, it is a reminder and proof at the same time. Photos from old good days themselves will tell the rest. 
Join the Art & Enjoy the Journey.

Stylistic features: Impact of light and working with it is a particularly important element of artist self-expression, same time unique author’s art code. Color in this case is original accent of sounding a visual language. Own authentic artist vision, sublimated into images.
